title: Running Enterprise Cassandra on Amazon EKS
description:
Kubernetes is the “secret sauce” that takes the heavy lifting out of enterprise Apache Cassandra® cluster deployments. Want to see how you can easily leverage Kubernetes in the cloud for your self-managed Cassandra clusters on AWS?

Join Aaron Ploetz for a webinar on how to support and deploy enterprise Cassandra databases on Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Server (EKS). Watch as he covers building a control plane on EKS, installing Mission Control, and deploying a new DataStax Enterprise (DSE) cluster.

Discover how to supercharge your self-managed Cassandra cluster process on EKS. Learn how to build and support your clusters with building blocks from the most-prolific cloud platform in the world!

Key Takeaways:
Get insight into Amazon EKS cluster configuration.
Learn how to leverage node groups.
Discover how to configure and use EKS “add-ons.”
A comprehensive overview of installing and configuring DataStax Mission Control.

Additional Resources:
- DataStax Developer Hub: https://datastax.com/devs
- DataStax Blog: https://www.datastax.com/blog/technical-how-tos
- Langflow: https://langflow.datastax.com
- Astra DB: https://astra.datastax.com
____________________

Stay in touch:
- Join our Discord Community: https://discord.gg/datastax
- Follow us on X: https://x.com/DataStaxDevs
